review: Desain eksterior mobil ini sangat modern dan futuristik, benar-benar eye-catching di jalanan. The exterior design of this car is very modern and futuristic, truly eye-catching on the road.

Performa mesinnya sangat responsif dan bertenaga, akselerasi cepat membuat pengalaman berkendara luar biasa. Its engine performance is very responsive and powerful, fast acceleration makes for an amazing driving experience.
Interior mobil terasa sangat mewah dengan material berkualitas tinggi dan jahitan rapi. The car's interior feels very luxurious with high-quality materials and neat stitching.

Fitur keselamatan canggih seperti pengereman otomatis dan adaptive cruise control memberikan rasa aman. Advanced safety features like automatic braking and adaptive cruise control provide a sense of security.
Konsumsi bahan bakarnya irit sekali untuk ukuran SUV sebesar ini, sangat efisien. Its fuel consumption is very economical for an SUV of this size, very efficient.
Desain lampu depannya terlalu biasa, tidak ada inovasi yang menonjol. The headlight design is too ordinary, no outstanding innovation.
Interior mobilnya cukup fungsional, tidak mewah tapi tidak ada yang perlu dikeluhkan. The car's interior is quite functional, not luxurious but nothing to complain about.
Performa standar saja, cukup untuk kebutuhan harian, tapi tidak istimewa. Standard performance, enough for daily needs, but not special.
Fitur konektivitasnya umum saja, sudah banyak mobil lain yang punya. Connectivity features are just common, many other cars already have them.
Ukuran bagasinya memadai, bisa menampung banyak barang, tidak ada masalah di sana. The trunk size is adequate, can fit many items, no problems there.
Kualitas material dashboard terasa sangat murah dan rentan tergores, mengecewakan. The dashboard material quality feels very cheap and scratch-prone, disappointing.
Sistem infotainment sering lag dan restart sendiri, sangat mengganggu saat perjalanan jauh. The infotainment system often lags and restarts on its own, very disruptive on long trips.
Performa mesin sangat lemot di tanjakan, sering kehabisan tenaga, berbahaya di jalan tol. Engine performance is very sluggish on inclines, often runs out of power, dangerous on highways.
Layanan purna jual dealer ini sangat buruk, susah klaim garansi dan antrean servis panjang. After-sales service at this dealership is very poor, difficult to claim warranty and long service queues.
Desain grill depannya terlalu agresif, tidak cocok dengan selera umum masyarakat. The front grille design is too aggressive, not suitable for the general public's taste.
Suspensi mobilnya sangat nyaman meredam guncangan, berkendara jadi mulus. The car's suspension comfortably absorbs bumps, making the ride smooth.
Harga jual kembalinya sangat stabil, investasi yang bagus untuk jangka panjang. Its resale value is very stable, a good long-term investment.
Sistem navigasi terintegrasi bekerja sangat akurat dan mudah digunakan. The integrated navigation system works very accurately and is easy to use.
Suara kabin sangat senyap di kecepatan tinggi, isolasi suaranya luar biasa. Cabin noise is very low at high speeds, sound insulation is excellent.
Ketersediaan spare part melimpah dan harganya terjangkau di pasaran. Spare parts availability is abundant and prices are affordable in the market.
Layar infotainmentnya responsif, tapi grafisnya terlihat ketinggalan zaman. The infotainment screen is responsive, but the graphics look outdated.
Kursi penumpang belakang terasa agak sempit untuk perjalanan jauh. Rear passenger seats feel a bit cramped for long journeys.
Pengaturan transmisi terasa kurang halus, ada sedikit hentakan saat perpindahan. The transmission setting feels less smooth, there's a slight jerk during shifts.
Warna interiornya terlalu gelap, kurang memberikan kesan lega. The interior color is too dark, doesn't give a spacious impression.
Sistem AC cukup dingin, tapi pengaturan zona tidak terlalu efektif. The AC system is cold enough, but zone settings are not very effective.
Build quality mobil ini sangat buruk, banyak panel tidak presisi dan cat mudah mengelupas. This car's build quality is very poor, many panels are not precise and paint peels easily.
Boros bahan bakar sekali, tidak sesuai dengan klaim pabrikan, rugi besar. Extremely fuel inefficient, not consistent with manufacturer's claims, a big loss.
Bunyi decit di kaki-kaki mobil mengganggu kenyamanan berkendara di jalan tidak rata. Squeaking noise from the car's suspension disturbs driving comfort on uneven roads.
Sering mogok di jalan padahal baru servis, reliabilitasnya diragukan. Often breaks down on the road despite recent service, its reliability is questioned.
Konektivitas Bluetooth sering putus-putus, membuat frustrasi saat telepon penting. Bluetooth connectivity frequently disconnects, frustrating during important calls.
Sistem audio premiumnya jernih dan menghasilkan suara yang memukau. Its premium audio system is clear and produces stunning sound.
Fitur parking assist otomatisnya sangat membantu di parkiran sempit kota. Its automatic parking assist feature is very helpful in tight city parking spaces.
Desain peleknya sporty dan menambah kesan gagah pada mobil. The wheel design is sporty and adds a powerful impression to the car.
Jarak pandang sangat lega dari posisi pengemudi, minim blind spot. Very clear visibility from the driver's position, minimal blind spots.
Ada banyak kompartemen penyimpanan yang cerdas di dalam kabin, sangat praktis. There are many clever storage compartments inside the cabin, very practical.
Sistem keyless entry terkadang sulit merespon, harus berkali-kali mencoba. The keyless entry system sometimes struggles to respond, requiring multiple attempts.
Material jok terasa panas jika diparkir di bawah terik matahari. Seat material feels hot when parked under direct sunlight.
Desain bumper belakang terlihat terlalu standar, tidak selaras depan. The rear bumper design looks too standard, not aligned with the front.
Remnya pakem, tapi ada sedikit rasa ngelos jika pengereman mendadak. Brakes are effective, but there's a slight feeling of losing control during sudden braking.
Tingkat kejut getaran dari jalanan sedikit terasa masuk kabin. The shock vibration from the road is slightly felt inside the cabin.
Akselerasinya lambat meskipun sudah 'kick-down' penuh, sangat frustrasi. Acceleration is slow even with full 'kick-down', very frustrating.
Suara knalpot terasa cempreng, tidak sesuai dengan karakter mobil mewah. Exhaust sound feels shrill, inconsistent with luxury car character.
Tinggi ground clearance terlalu rendah, sering mentok di jalan bergelombang. Ground clearance is too low, often scrapes on wavy roads.
Sensor parkir sering false alarm, malah bikin bingung dan tidak percaya. Parking sensors often false alarm, actually causing confusion and distrust.
Biaya perawatan di bengkel resmi sangat mahal, lebih baik di bengkel luar. Maintenance costs at authorized workshops are very expensive, better at independent garages.
Adaptive cruise control-nya bekerja mulus, sangat meringankan perjalanan jauh. Its adaptive cruise control works smoothly, greatly easing long journeys.
Material kulit joknya sangat lembut dan berkualitas tinggi, nyaman sekali. The leather seat material is very soft and high-quality, extremely comfortable.
Integrasi Apple CarPlay/Android Auto-nya responsif tanpa lag sama sekali. Its Apple CarPlay/Android Auto integration is responsive without any lag.
Bobot kemudi terasa pas, memberikan feeling berkendara yang sporty dan stabil. Steering weight feels just right, providing a sporty and stable driving feel.
Model pintu bagasi belakang sudah otomatis, sangat praktis saat membawa barang banyak. The rear tailgate is automatic, very practical when carrying many items.
Visibilitas kaca spion terasa sedikit kurang luas. Rearview mirror visibility feels a bit limited.
Pilihan warna bodi mobil kurang variatif, cenderung warna dasar saja. Body color options are less varied, mostly basic colors.
Lampu belakang LED modern, tapi bentuknya agak standar. Rear LED lights are modern, but the shape is a bit standard.
Fitur voice command kadang tidak memahami perintah dengan baik. Voice command feature sometimes doesn't understand commands well.
Ukuran layar MID (Multi-Information Display) kurang besar. MID (Multi-Information Display) screen size is not big enough.
Tenaga mesin terasa ngedrop setelah melewati 100 km/jam, sangat mengganggu. Engine power feels dropped after 100 km/h, very annoying.
Lampu depan LED kurang terang saat malam hari, tidak optimal. Front LED lights are not bright enough at night, not optimal.
Jok kulitnya cepat mengelupas di bagian samping, padahal baru beberapa bulan. Leather seats peel quickly on the sides, even though it's only been a few months.
Banyaknya tombol fisik di dashboard membuat interior terasa ramai dan tidak minimalis. Too many physical buttons on the dashboard make the interior feel cluttered and not minimalist.
Servis di bengkel resmi selalu antre panjang, sangat tidak efisien dan buang waktu. Service at authorized workshops always has long queues, very inefficient and time-consuming.
Head-up display sangat jelas dan informatif, memudahkan pantau informasi. The head-up display is very clear and informative, making it easy to monitor information.
Kapasitas tempat duduknya lapang, bahkan di baris ketiga pun masih nyaman untuk dewasa. Seating capacity is spacious, even the third row is comfortable for adults.
Desain velg yang berani dan futuristik, menambah nilai estetika pada mobil. The bold and futuristic wheel design adds aesthetic value to the car.
Efisiensi bahan bakar di lalu lintas kota cukup impresif. Fuel efficiency in city traffic is quite impressive.
Sistem keamanan alarm yang sangat sensitif dan memberikan ketenangan saat parkir. The alarm security system is very sensitive and provides peace of mind when parking.
Lampu senja DRL terlihat modern, tapi saat siang hari kurang menonjol. DRL (Daytime Running Lights) looks modern, but less prominent during daytime.
Sistem rem darurat otomatis kadang terlalu sensitif, sedikit mengejutkan. Automatic emergency braking system is sometimes too sensitive, a bit startling.
Aksesoris eksterior after market cukup terbatas pilihannya. Aftermarket exterior accessories are quite limited in choice.
Desain dashboard bersih dan minimalis, namun material terasa generik. Dashboard design is clean and minimalist, but material feels generic.
Resale value-nya cukup kompetitif di pasar, tidak merugi. Its resale value is quite competitive in the market, not a loss.
Penggerak roda depan kurang responsif saat start awal. Front-wheel drive is less responsive at initial start.
Kualitas audio speaker bawaan sangat buruk, suara pecah di volume tinggi. The quality of the default audio speakers is very poor, sound cracks at high volume.
Tempat pengisian daya nirkabel seringkali tidak berfungsi, buang fitur. Wireless charging pad often doesn't work, wasted feature.
Fitur sunroof-nya sering macet saat dibuka, perlu tenaga ekstra. Sunroof often gets stuck when opened, requires extra effort.
Biaya perbaikan suku cadang non-garansi sangat mahal di bengkel resmi. Repair costs for non-warranty spare parts are very expensive at authorized workshops.
Kinerja transmisi otomatis sangat halus, perpindahan gigi tak terasa. Automatic transmission performance is very smooth, gear shifts are imperceptible.
Sistem pencahayaan interior ambient lighting sangat keren dan bisa diatur warna. Interior ambient lighting system is very cool and color adjustable.
Sudut kemudi ringan, cocok untuk bermanuver di kepadatan kota. Light steering angle, suitable for maneuvering in city traffic congestion.
Sistem hiburan di jok belakang membuat anak-anak betah di perjalanan. Rear seat entertainment system keeps children comfortable on journeys.
Fitur autonomous driving-nya cukup akurat, mengurangi beban pengemudi di tol. Its autonomous driving feature is quite accurate, reducing driver load on highways.
Performa handling saat bermanuver di kecepatan tinggi terasa kurang stabil. High-speed handling during maneuvers feels less stable.
Sistem ventilasi jok kurang efektif, tetap terasa panas di cuaca terik. Seat ventilation system is less effective, still feels hot in scorching weather.
Celah panel interior banyak yang renggang, terkesan kurang rapi. Many interior panel gaps are loose, appearing untidy.
Fitur auto high beam lampu sering salah deteksi kendaraan lain, membahayakan. Auto high beam feature often misdetects other vehicles, dangerous.
Asuransi tahunan mobil ini sangat mahal, di atas rata-rata mobil sekelasnya. Annual car insurance is very expensive, above average for its class.
Build quality yang solid, tidak ada bunyi-bunyian di kabin. Solid build quality, no cabin noises.
Fitur remote start sangat praktis di pagi hari saat cuaca dingin. Remote start feature is very practical on cold mornings.
Tersedia layanan after sales 'jemput-antar' kendaraan untuk servis. 'Pick-up and drop-off' after-sales service is available for vehicle maintenance.
Head unit layar besar dan sangat responsif, navigasi jadi mudah. Large head unit screen is very responsive, navigation becomes easy.
Sistem pendingin mesin bekerja optimal, suhu selalu stabil di kemacetan. Engine cooling system works optimally, temperature always stable in traffic.
Kualitas cat bodi mobil terasa tipis dan mudah terkelupas. The car's paint quality feels thin and easily peels off.
Mode berkendara eco terlalu lemot, tidak responsif sama sekali. Eco driving mode is too sluggish, completely unresponsive.
Jaringan bengkel resmi tidak tersebar merata, susah mencari lokasi. Authorized workshop network is not evenly distributed, difficult to find locations.
Desain handle pintu terasa kuno, tidak menyatu dengan estetika modern. Door handle design feels outdated, doesn't blend with modern aesthetics.
Suara derit ban sangat mengganggu saat berbelok tajam di kecepatan rendah. Tire squealing noise is very disruptive when making sharp turns at low speeds.
Material interior mobil ini terbuat dari daur ulang, sangat ramah lingkungan. This car's interior material is made from recycled materials, very environmentally friendly.
Fitur pemantauan tekanan ban sangat akurat, meningkatkan keselamatan berkendara. Tire pressure monitoring feature is very accurate, increasing driving safety.
Tenaga mesin listriknya sangat instan, responsif, dan tanpa emisi. Its electric engine power is instant, responsive, and emission-free.
Ukuran kursi penumpang baris kedua sangat lebar dan nyaman untuk 3 orang dewasa. Second row passenger seats are very wide and comfortable for 3 adults.
Purna jual kendaraan listrik ini dijamin, membuat aman untuk investasi. The after-sales of this electric vehicle is guaranteed, making it a safe investment.
Bobot mobil terlalu berat, membuat konsumsi baterai kurang efisien. Car weight is too heavy, making battery consumption less efficient.
Lama waktu pengisian baterai terlalu panjang, tidak efisien di perjalanan. Battery charging time is too long, not efficient on journeys.
Harga baterai pengganti sangat mahal, butuh biaya fantastis jika rusak. Replacement battery price is very expensive, requires a fantastic cost if damaged.
Sistem pendingin baterai sering mengalami overheat, khawatir masalah jangka panjang. Battery cooling system often overheats, worried about long-term problems.
Fitur fast charging hanya tersedia di sedikit SPKLU, kurang praktis. Fast charging feature only available at few public charging stations, less practical.
Teknologi 'driverless' bekerja dengan presisi tinggi, masa depan otomotif. 'Driverless' technology works with high precision, the future of automotive.
Sistem deteksi blind spot sangat membantu di jalan raya padat. Blind spot detection system is very helpful on crowded highways.
Konsumsi daya listrik untuk fitur-fitur hiburan di kabin sangat efisien. Power consumption for in-cabin entertainment features is very efficient.
Kualitas material pelapis kursi terasa sangat lembut, anti-panas. Seat upholstery material feels very soft, anti-heat.
Ukuran head room lega, tidak ada masalah meski pengemudi tinggi. Headroom is spacious, no issues even for tall drivers.
Desain lampu sein terasa kurang inovatif, mirip mobil lama. Turn signal design feels less innovative, similar to old cars.
Suara mesin saat idle terasa sedikit kasar, perlu dihaluskan. Engine noise at idle feels a bit rough, needs to be smoothed out.
Pintu mobil terasa agak berat saat dibuka atau ditutup. Car doors feel a bit heavy when opened or closed.
Jarak putar kemudi cukup lebar, sedikit menyulitkan saat parkir paralel. Steering turning radius is quite wide, slightly complicating parallel parking.
Desain spion luar terlalu besar, sedikit mengganggu estetika. Exterior mirror design is too large, slightly disrupts aesthetics.
Kinerja autonomous driving-nya belum sempurna, masih sering blank. Autonomous driving performance is not perfect, still often blanks.
Sensor kamera belakang sering buram, sulit melihat objek dengan jelas. Rear camera sensor often blurry, difficult to see objects clearly.
Jok kulitnya cepat retak setelah beberapa tahun, kualitasnya kurang bagus. Leather seats crack quickly after a few years, quality is poor.
Bunyi derit saat melewati polisi tidur, mengganggu kenyamanan. Squeaking noise when passing speed bumps, disturbs comfort.
Filter AC mudah kotor dan bau, perlu sering diganti. AC filter gets dirty and smelly easily, needs frequent replacement.
Sistem pengereman regeneratif sangat efektif, menambah jarak tempuh. Regenerative braking system is very effective, extending range.
Pengisian baterai sangat cepat, hanya 30 menit untuk 80%. Battery charging is very fast, only 30 minutes for 80%.
Interior menggunakan banyak material soft-touch, nyaman disentuh. Interior uses many soft-touch materials, comfortable to touch.
Pengaturan posisi duduk pengemudi sangat ergonomis dan mudah disesuaikan. Driver's seating position is very ergonomic and easily adjustable.
Varian warna interior bervariasi, memberikan banyak pilihan personalisasi. Interior color variants are varied, providing many personalization options.
Ukuran roda kemudi terasa sedikit terlalu besar. Steering wheel size feels a bit too large.
Material karpet dasar terasa standar, tidak ada kesan mewah. Floor mat material feels standard, no luxurious impression.
Desain knalpot terlihat generik, kurang inovatif. Exhaust design looks generic, less innovative.
Cahaya lampu sein terasa kurang cerah saat siang hari. Turn signal light feels less bright during daytime.
Tingkat aerodinamika desainnya cukup baik. Aerodynamics of the design are quite good.
Daya tahan baterai cepat habis jika AC dinyalakan penuh. Battery life drains quickly if AC is on full.
Sensor wiper otomatis sering aktif tidak pada waktunya, mengganggu. Automatic wiper sensor often activates untimely, distracting.
Material doortrim depan mudah kusam dan pudar warna. Front doortrim material easily dulls and fades in color.
Tarikannya terasa lambat di kecepatan menengah. Acceleration feels slow at medium speeds.
Tombol transmisi terasa agak keras, butuh tenaga lebih saat ditekan. Transmission button feels a bit stiff, requires more force when pressed.
Teknologi pengereman darurat otonom bekerja presisi di kondisi kritis. Autonomous emergency braking technology works precisely in critical conditions.
Penyaluran tenaga mesin sangat halus tanpa lag atau getaran berlebihan. Engine power delivery is very smooth without lag or excessive vibration.
Lampu depan matriks LED cerdas menyesuaikan pencahayaan otomatis. Matrix LED headlights intelligently adjust lighting automatically.
Penyimpanan di bawah lantai bagasi sangat luas, tersembunyi, dan praktis. Underfloor trunk storage is very spacious, hidden, and practical.
Sistem pengenalan wajah untuk pengemudi sangat inovatif. Facial recognition system for drivers is very innovative.
Harga beli kendaraan ini terasa sangat mahal untuk target pasar. The purchase price of this vehicle feels very expensive for its target market.
Bobot pintu mobil terlalu ringan, terasa kurang kokoh saat ditutup. Car door weight is too light, feels less sturdy when closed.
Pengaturan kursi otomatis terlalu lambat dalam merespon perintah. Automatic seat adjustment is too slow in responding to commands.
Kualitas kamera 360 derajat buram saat kondisi cahaya minim. 360-degree camera quality is blurry in low light conditions.
Perangkat keras fitur konektivitas cepat usang, butuh update rutin. Connectivity feature hardware quickly becomes obsolete, requiring routine updates.
Fitur monitor blind spot di kaca spion sangat membantu keamanan. Blind spot monitor feature in rearview mirror is very helpful for safety.
Material karbon fiber interior membuat kabin terasa sporty dan eksklusif. Carbon fiber interior material makes the cabin feel sporty and exclusive.
Kinerja AWD (All-Wheel Drive) sangat andal di medan off-road ringan. AWD (All-Wheel Drive) performance is very reliable in light off-road terrain.
Posisi tuas transmisi ergonomis, mudah dijangkau pengemudi. Transmission lever position is ergonomic, easily reachable by driver.
Mode berkendara sport memberikan respons akselerasi yang memukau. Sport driving mode provides stunning acceleration response.
Harga servis pertama terlalu mahal, padahal masih garansi. First service price is too expensive, even though still under warranty.
Jarak tempuh baterai tidak sesuai klaim, lebih cepat habis. Battery range does not match claims, depletes faster.
Kabel charging bawaan mudah rusak, perlu beli yang lebih kuat. Default charging cable breaks easily, needs to buy a stronger one.
Applikasi smartphone pendukung sering crash dan tidak terhubung mobil. Companion smartphone app often crashes and fails to connect to car.
Sistem voice assistant kurang pintar, sering gagal memahami perintah. Voice assistant system is not smart enough, often fails to understand commands.
Desain grille depan dengan aksen krom mewah, tampil elegan. Front grille design with luxurious chrome accents, looks elegant.
Rem parkir elektrik responsif dan mudah dioperasikan. Electric parking brake is responsive and easy to operate.
Kualitas audio speaker sangat powerful, bass terasa pas. Audio speaker quality is very powerful, bass feels just right.
Bobot setir ringan saat parkir, mudah bermanuver di ruang sempit. Light steering weight when parking, easy to maneuver in tight spaces.
Varian transmisi CVT yang responsif dan hemat BBM. Responsive and fuel-efficient CVT transmission variant.
Sistem pengereman ABS kadang terasa bergetar keras di pedal. ABS braking system sometimes feels hard vibrations on the pedal.
Ruang kaki di baris kedua agak terbatas untuk orang dewasa tinggi. Legroom in the second row is a bit limited for tall adults.
Desain headlamp terlihat agak kuno, kurang modern. Headlamp design looks a bit outdated, less modern.
Tingkat keempukan jok belakang kurang maksimal jika dibandingkan depan. Rear seat softness is less optimal compared to the front.
Fungsi tombol di kemudi kadang sedikit tidak presisi. Button functions on the steering wheel are sometimes slightly imprecise.
Harga spare part orisinal sulit didapat dan mahal di pasaran. Original spare parts are hard to find and expensive in the market.
Catatan sejarah merek mobil ini terkait recalled model sebelumnya. This car brand's historical record related to previous recalled models.
Biaya ganti oli transmisi di luar garansi sangat mahal sekali. Out-of-warranty transmission oil change cost is very expensive.
Bagasi otomatis sering macet saat kondisi hujan. Automatic trunk often gets stuck in rainy conditions.
Banyak laporan kerusakan minor di interior setelah beberapa tahun pemakaian. Many reports of minor interior damage after a few years of use.
Lampu belakang dengan desain LED tiga dimensi, sangat menarik. Rear lights with 3D LED design, very attractive.
Peredam kejutnya sangat baik, melewati jalan rusak tetap stabil. The shock absorbers are very good, staying stable even on bad roads.
Sistem keamanan 'sentinel mode' memberikan pengawasan penuh 24 jam. 'Sentinel mode' security system provides full 24-hour surveillance.
Radius putar kecil, mudah putar balik di jalan sempit. Small turning radius, easy to make U-turns on narrow streets.
Material atap kaca panoramic memberikan kesan lapang dan mewah. Panoramic glass roof material gives a spacious and luxurious impression.
Visibilitas pilar A cukup mengganggu saat belok di persimpangan. A-pillar visibility is quite disruptive when turning at intersections.
Tombol Start/Stop Engine terkesan generik, tidak premium. Start/Stop Engine button seems generic, not premium.
Bagasi kurang fitur lampu, gelap di malam hari. Trunk lacks light features, dark at night.
Bobot pintu mobil cukup ringan. Car door weight is quite light.
Jok baris ketiga cukup nyaman untuk anak kecil, tidak dewasa. Third-row seats are comfortable enough for small children, not adults.
Kinerja power steering elektrik terkadang terlalu ringan di tol. Electric power steering performance is sometimes too light on highways.
Fitur 'summon' mobil tidak akurat, malah nyasar ke tembok. Car 'summon' feature is inaccurate, misdirects to walls.
Suara dengungan dari motor listrik di kabin terasa jelas. Humming noise from electric motor in cabin is clearly felt.
Banyak update software yang bikin bug baru, merepotkan pengemudi. Many software updates create new bugs, inconveniencing drivers.
Jaringan SPKLU di luar kota masih sangat minim, susah cari charging. Public charging station network outside city is very minimal, hard to find charging.
Sistem pre-collision safety bekerja sangat baik dalam kondisi lalu lintas padat. The pre-collision safety system works very well in heavy traffic conditions.
Desain keseluruhan mobilnya timeless, tidak lekang oleh waktu. The car's overall design is timeless, enduring through time.
Fitur 'over-the-air update' untuk software mobil sangat praktis. 'Over-the-air update' feature for car software is very practical.
Pengaturan mode berkendara yang personalizable sangat disukai pengemudi. Personalized driving mode settings are highly favored by drivers.
Respon rem kaki responsif dan sangat mantap. Brake pedal response is responsive and very firm.
Desain handle pintu retractables kadang sulit terbuka di cuaca dingin. Retractable door handle design is sometimes difficult to open in cold weather.
Cahaya lampu sein belakang kurang menonjol saat di rem. Rear turn signal light is less prominent when braking.
Jarak tuas transmisi terlalu jauh dari jangkauan pengemudi. Transmission lever is too far from driver's reach.
Fitur ventilasi jok hanya ada di depan, tidak di belakang. Seat ventilation feature only available in front, not rear.
Harga spare part kelistrikan terasa agak mahal. Electrical spare parts price feels a bit expensive.
Akselerasi awal mobil terasa tertahan, butuh beberapa detik baru melejit. Initial car acceleration feels restrained, takes a few seconds to zoom off.
Pilihan mode berkendara terlalu sedikit, kurang sesuai kebutuhan. Too few driving mode options, less suitable for needs.
Sensor deteksi kendaraan lain di samping sering tidak akurat. Side vehicle detection sensor often inaccurate.
Interior jok depan cepat kotor dan sulit dibersihkan. Front seats quickly get dirty and are difficult to clean.
Biaya pajak tahunan sangat tinggi, jadi beban pemilik. Annual tax is very high, a burden for owners.
Performa handlingnya sangat sporty, tajam, dan memuaskan. Its handling performance is very sporty, sharp, and satisfying.
Konsumsi BBM-nya efisien bahkan di kecepatan tinggi, ini luar biasa. Fuel efficiency is impressive even at high speeds, this is extraordinary.
Sistem parkir otomatis sangat cerdas dan mulus, parkir jadi mudah. Automatic parking system is very smart and smooth, parking becomes easy.
Desain panel instrumen digital sepenuhnya, bisa diatur sesuai preferensi. Fully digital instrument cluster, adjustable according to preference.
Pengisian bahan bakar mudah dan lubangnya besar, tidak berceceran. Fuel filling is easy and the opening is large, no spillage.
Radius putar kemudi terlalu lebar untuk mobil perkotaan. Steering turning radius is too wide for a city car.
Tinggi kursi tidak terlalu bisa disesuaikan dengan baik untuk pengemudi tinggi. Seat height cannot be adjusted well enough for tall drivers.
Lampu interior LED terasa terlalu terang di malam hari. Interior LED lights feel too bright at night.
Pengaturan spion elektrik terkadang lambat merespon. Electric mirror adjustment is sometimes slow to respond.

Interior material jok fabric terasa biasa saja, bukan mewah tapi cukup nyaman diduduki. Interior fabric seat material feels ordinary, not luxurious but comfortable enough to sit on.
Pengaturan transmisi manual tidak istimewa, perpindahan gigi normal, bukan yang paling presisi. Manual transmission adjustment is not special, normal gear shifts, not the most precise.
Peredaman suara jalan dari kolong mobil terasa lumayan, masih terdengar sedikit bising dari luar. Road noise dampening from under the car feels okay, still some noise from outside.

Servis di bengkel umum cukup mudah dan murah, jadi ada alternatif jika malas ke dealer resmi. Service at general garages is quite easy and affordable, offering an alternative to authorized dealerships.

Model pintu bagasi belakang tidak otomatis, harus diangkat manual, sedikit merepotkan jika bawa banyak barang. Rear tailgate is not automatic, must be lifted manually, a bit inconvenient when carrying many items.
Ketersediaan aksesoris aftermarket banyak pilihan, memudahkan kustomisasi mobil sesuai selera. Aftermarket accessory availability has many choices, facilitating car customization according to taste.
Tinggi plafon kabin cukup lapang, tidak membuat kepala mentok meskipun pengemudi tinggi. Cabin ceiling height is quite spacious, head doesn't hit even for tall drivers.
Desain lampu belakang terlihat konvensional, tidak futuristik, tapi fungsional. Rear light design looks conventional, not futuristic, but functional.
Konsumsi BBM lumayan di jalan tol, tidak terlalu boros di kecepatan konstan. Fuel consumption is decent on highways, not too wasteful at constant speeds.
Tombol power window berfungsi baik, tidak ada macet, respons standar saja. Power window buttons work well, no sticking, standard response.
Kaca film bawaan kurang gelap untuk privasi maksimal, mungkin perlu diganti. Default window tint is not dark enough for maximum privacy, might need replacement.
Jok baris ketiga terasa sempit, lebih cocok untuk anak kecil atau perjalanan sangat singkat. Third row seats feel cramped, more suitable for small children or very short trips.
Kinerja AWD (All-Wheel Drive) tidak terlalu sering dipakai untuk penggunaan dalam kota. AWD performance not used very often for urban driving.
Ukuran pelek cukup standar, tidak membuat mobil tampil menonjol di keramaian. Wheel size is quite standard, doesn't make the car stand out in a crowd.
Suara wiper terdengar cukup jelas saat hujan, tidak berisik tapi bukan senyap juga. Wiper sound is quite audible in rain, not noisy but not silent either.

Posisi pengisi daya USB lumayan mudah dijangkau, tidak terlalu tersembunyi. USB charger position is reasonably easy to reach, not too hidden.
Fitur voice command bekerja normal saja, perlu intonasi yang jelas. Voice command feature works normally, requires clear intonation.
Sistem pendingin AC berfungsi dengan baik, tidak ada keluhan serius. AC cooling system works well, no serious complaints.
Penyaluran tenaga terasa linear di berbagai kecepatan, cukup predictable. Power delivery feels linear at various speeds, quite predictable.
Keamanan alarm terasa biasa, tidak ada fitur pengamanan yang istimewa. Alarm security feels ordinary, no special security features.
Tingkat aerodinamika terlihat biasa, bukan yang terbaik di kelasnya. Aerodynamics look ordinary, not the best in its class.
Sistem deteksi blind spot tidak terlalu membantu, visualisasinya kecil. Blind spot detection system is not very helpful, small visualization.

Peredaman suara jalan dari kolong mobil terasa lumayan, masih terdengar sedikit bising dari luar. Road noise dampening from under the car feels okay, still some noise from outside.

Model pintu bagasi belakang tidak otomatis, harus diangkat manual, sedikit merepotkan jika bawa banyak barang. Rear tailgate is not automatic, must be lifted manually, a bit inconvenient when carrying many items.

Konsumsi BBM lumayan di jalan tol, tidak terlalu boros di kecepatan konstan. Fuel consumption is decent on highways, not too wasteful at constant speeds.

Posisi pengisi daya USB lumayan mudah dijangkau, tidak terlalu tersembunyi. USB charger position is reasonably easy to reach, not too hidden.
Fitur voice command bekerja normal saja, perlu intonasi yang jelas. Voice command feature works normally, requires clear intonation.
Sistem pendingin AC berfungsi dengan baik, tidak ada keluhan serius. AC cooling system works well, no serious complaints.
Penyaluran tenaga terasa linear di berbagai kecepatan, cukup predictable. Power delivery feels linear at various speeds, quite predictable.
Keamanan alarm terasa biasa, tidak ada fitur pengamanan yang istimewa. Alarm security feels ordinary, no special security features.
